title: Fire Island National Seashore: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate             Donate          Â    There are many ways you can help support the National Park Service and Fire Island National Seashore. Your participation and assistance is greatly appreciated. Make a Donation  Donations are always welcome and help to support park operations and programs. Please make your donation by check or money order payable to:  Fire Island National Seashore 120 Laurel Street Patchogue, NY 11772  Please specify either the General Purpose Donation Account or the William Floyd Estate Donation Account.  Several official park partners are also approved to accept donations and raise funds that support Fire Island National Seashore.  Join Our Friends Cooperating Associations  Volunteer  You may also be interested in donating your time and talents.  Volunteer Artist-in-Residence
